Name: Eureka Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A punchy, full-flavoured, veritable basket of fruit.
History: Recipe adapted from a 1935 Bar Florida (later renamed Floridita) menu, Havana, Cuba. "Sherry Brandy" in the menu's recipe is presumed to be a typo for cherry brandy.
Nutrition: One serving of Eureka Cocktail contains 124 calories
